Description: counts scaled by total number of reads
Recommendations for use: gene count comparisons between replicates of the same samplegroup; **NOT for within sample comparisons or DE analysis**

Description: counts per length of transcript (kb) per million reads mapped
Recommendations for use: gene count comparisons within a sample or between samples of the same sample group; **NOT for DE analysis**

Normalization method: **RPKM/FPKM** (reads/fragments per kilobase of exon per million reads/fragments mapped)
Recommendations for use: gene count comparisons between genes within a sample; **NOT for between sample comparisons or DE analysis**

Description: counts divided by sample-specific size factors determined by median ratio of gene counts relative to geometric mean per gene
Recommendations for use: gene count comparisons between samples and for **DE analysis**; **NOT for within sample comparisons**

Description: uses a weighted trimmed mean of the log expression ratios between samples
Recommendations for use: gene count comparisons between samples and for **DE analysis**; **NOT for within sample comparisons**
